text: Saul gaa huli ono goloo, ga ulu ono huai gahu gi de modongoohia ia, gei mee gaa hana i di boo mo ana daangada dauwa dogolua madalia a mee, belee hana e haga heetugi ang gi di ahina deelaa. Mee ga helekai, “Pono ina dogu lohongo, heeu gi di hagataalunga gi hagia mai gi di au be dehee di mee gaa hai. Gahi aga ina di mouli taane dela ga hagi adu dono ingoo ko au.”
